knimeNode.name: IBM Rational ClearQuest Adapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a data table from a file output right out of IBM Clear Quest application.

fullDescription.intro:
This node reads a data loaded from a file that has to be generated by IBM Clear Quest application.
To generate a file that may be read you have to follow the steps:
Log in to IBM Rational Clear Quest software
Using Clear Quest Navigator list the desired set of Bug Reports
Use "Export" option icon located upper right corner of the screen to drop down the "Export" menu.
Select "Export to an Excel Spreadsheet" option to export Bug Reports (defects) to a MS Excel file (*.xls extension) format.
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file name. You can also choose a previously selected file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog. Supported are xls and xlsx file formats.
After selecting a file, you can select the sheet from the available sheets in the file.
If empty rows or columns should be removed from the result Data Table, check the appropriate option.
Specify the data that is inserted in a cell with an error. Similar to XLS Reader Node.
The "Preview" tab shows you the output table with the current settings in the dialog. If the settings are invalid an error message will be displayed in this tab.
The "File Content" table shows you the content of the currently selected file.

ports.outPort: Output data compatible with ITS Data Type.
